Name: CustomPrivileges
Description: This samples demonstrates how to create custom privileges dynamically.
Requirements: No requirements are needed for this sample.
Instructions: From ConfigTool, click on User Management.
Privileges can be viewed under Task Privileges -> New Privileges
Edit the privileges created in privileges.json from the output path
A set timer of 15 seconds will refresh the privileges automatically
Privileges can be added, removed and modified
Result: Add, Remove or Modify privileges dynamically
Title: Custom Privileges
